pull.title: test: Treat `bitcoin-wallet` binary in the same way as others
pull.body: This PR makes the `bitcoin-wallet` binary path customizable in the same way how it can be done now with other ones, including `bitcoind`, `bitcoin-cli` and `bitcoin-util`.

Nice little refactoring (modulo being able to now set `BITCOINWALLET` which is new behaviour), less code duplication and functions with smaller scope.

function.

events.message:
test, refactor: Add `set_binary_paths` function

This change factors out the repeated code into a new `set_binary_paths`
function.

verification.payload:
tree e2efd2e8ae1d4faac7c31c6d4505216798d23bfe
parent dda961cec5fef318c0b043a09367d14daa87f089
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1683290130 +0100
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1683290130 +0100

test: Treat `bitcoin-wallet` binary in the same way as others

This change makes the `bitcoin-wallet` binary path customizable in the
same way how it can be done now with other ones, including `bitcoind`,
`bitcoin-cli` and `bitcoin-util`.

events.message:
test: Treat `bitcoin-wallet` binary in the same way as others

This change makes the `bitcoin-wallet` binary path customizable in the
same way how it can be done now with other ones, including `bitcoind`,
`bitcoin-cli` and `bitcoin-util`.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -252,9 +252,15 @@ def setup(self):
             "src",
             "bitcoin-util" + config["environment"]["EXEEXT"],
         )
+        fname_bitcoinwallet = os.path.join(
+            config["environment"]["BUILDDIR"],
+            "src",
+            "bitcoin-wallet" + config["environment"]["EXEEXT"],
+        )
         self.options.bitcoind = os.getenv("BITCOIND", default=fname_bitcoind)
         self.options.bitcoincli = os.getenv("BITCOINCLI", default=fname_bitcoincli)
         self.options.bitcoinutil = os.getenv("BITCOINUTIL", default=fname_bitcoinutil)
+        self.options.bitcoinwallet = os.getenv("BITCOINWALLET", default=fname_bitcoinwallet)
comments.body:
```suggestion
        self.options.bitcoinwallet = os.getenv("BITCOINWALLET", default=fname("bitcoin-wallet"))
```

What about making this a function to reduce code bloat while touching this?

+            "src",
+            "bitcoin-wallet" + config["environment"]["EXEEXT"],
+        )
         self.options.bitcoind = os.getenv("BITCOIND", default=fname_bitcoind)
         self.options.bitcoincli = os.getenv("BITCOINCLI", default=fname_bitcoincli)
         self.options.bitcoinutil = os.getenv("BITCOINUTIL", default=fname_bitcoinutil)
+        self.options.bitcoinwallet = os.getenv("BITCOINWALLET", default=fname_bitcoinwallet)
comments.body:
> What about making this a function to reduce code bloat while touching this?

Done.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -228,6 +228,23 @@ def parse_args(self):
 
         PortSeed.n = self.options.port_seed
 
+    def set_binary_paths(self):
+        binaries = {
+            "bitcoind": ("bitcoind", "BITCOIND"),
+            "bitcoin-cli": ("bitcoincli", "BITCOINCLI"),
+            "bitcoin-util": ("bitcoinutil", "BITCOINUTIL"),
+            "bitcoin-wallet": ("bitcoinwallet", "BITCOINWALLET"),
+        }
+        for binary in binaries.keys():
+            attribute_name = binaries[binary][0]
+            env_variable_name = binaries[binary][1]

comments.body:
nit
```suggestion
        for binary, [attribute_name, env_variable_name] in binaries.items():
```
